bibl.title: Sophocles with Music? Ptolemaic Music Fragments and Remains of Sophocles (Junior?), Achilleus.
bibl.note: Cartonnage scraps. Fayûm, third to second century B.C. - A. Fragments of Sophocles, Achilleus. - B. The Tragic Lyrics. - C. The Other Music Fragments.
WEST Martin L., Sophocles with Music? Ptolemaic Music Fragments and Remains of Sophocles (Junior?), Achilleus.
